direction.raw_text: . 75 - PROLOGUE FADE IN: A cave painting of the Dreamworks logo. Push past the moon to the sun. Bright. Beautiful. The sun DISSOLVES TO: Cave paintings of a family of cavemen -- we will come to know them as The Croods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With every sun comes a new day. A new beginning. A hope that things will be better today than they were yesterday. The Croods scurry out of their cave like mice looking for food. Scared. Fast. The Croods are chased by beasts across the desert. They escape from creatures up trees. They hide behind rocks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But not for me. My name's Eep. This, is my family, the Croods. If you weren't clued in already by the animal skins and sloping foreheads - we're cavemen. Most days we spend in our cave, in the dark. Night after night, day after day. Yep. Home sweet home. When we did go out, we struggled to find food in a harsh and hostile world. And I struggled to survive my family. The Croods are chased by beasts across the desert. They escape from creatures up trees. They hide behind rocks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We were the last ones around. There used to be neighbors. The Gorts, smashed by a mammoth. The Horks, swallowed by a sand snake. The Erfs, mosquito bite. Throgs, common cold. And, the Croods. That's us. The Croods made it... Grug protects his family from a GIANT BEAR OWL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because of my Dad. He was strong... and he followed the rules. A shadow falls across their feet and Grug ushers his family home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... the ones painted on the cave walls. Anything new is bad, curiosity is bad, going out at night is bad. Basically, anything fun is bad. Welcome to my world. They all run back into the cave where Grug slams the rock door closed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . But this time the light casts an ominous tone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But this is a story about how all that changed in an instant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because what we didn't know, was that our world was about to come to an end. And there were no rules on our cave walls to prepare us for that.

direction.raw_text: I can't change. I don't have ideas. But I have my strength. And right now that's all you need.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. We don't know what's over there. Maybe nothing. It's too risky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a chance. Belt wipes a tear off his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll take that chance. Grug LIFTS Guy above his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, I've wanted to throw you away ever since I met you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heh. That's a joke, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's a joke? Grug's comment freaks Guy out. ANOTHER ANGLE shows Grug with a twinkle in his eye. Belt puts on his helmet for safety. With a titanic effort, he HURLS Guy in to the void. The Croods wait an eternity. Then - a HORN SOUNDS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He made it... He made it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, Thunk. Your turn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not coming, are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When you make it, so will I. Grug HURLS Thunk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Ugga KISSES Grug. She whispers in his ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You did good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daddy. Grug wipes a tear from Ugga's eye. Then lifts her above his head. He HURLS her across.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gran. Gran is next in line.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No mush, just throw me. Grug LIFTS her above his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait. You surprised me today. Lunkhead. Grug SMILES and throws her next.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (landing on the other side) Still alive!!! Another TREMBLER. MORE cliff FALLS away. Now the distance is even greater. Eep is next in line.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Time to go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I have too much to say to you. I need to fix everything and I don't have time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can fix it. Grug embraces Eep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This works good. What do you call it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was thinking of calling it a Hug. (clears his throat) (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because it rhymes with Grug. But you can change it if you want.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I like a "Hug."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love you. Eep takes in the full effect of her dad's words.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... The ground begins to shake and break apart around them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad, I'm scared.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never be afraid. The gap grows wider. Grug lifts Eep and makes the greatest throw of his life. The tumult parts briefly. Grug can see his entire family safe on the other side. He waves a last goodbye. To his surprise, a shaft of sunlight has settled on his open hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There. I see him! The family waves to Grug to let him know they are okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 2750 - FAMILY PORTRAIT EXT. CLIFFSIDE Grug is startled by another earthquake. The ground is ripping itself apart as meteors begin to fall around him. Grug dodges falling debris and lighting and manages to crawl into a nearby cave-- a familiar place for him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grug grabs two pieces of flint and starts clicking them together, just as Guy did earlier. They ignite. Grug has created his very first fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, I did it. Another earthquake shakes the cavern. Grug moves over to a wall and uses some nearby mud to paint a portrait of his family. He paints each member individually and then looks longingly at the family he will never see again. The torch begins to go out. Grug blows on it and is startled by the massive Macawnivore beast, growling at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahhhh! Back! Stay back! Stay back! The Macawnivore blows out the torch. Another meteor hits the cave with a loud boom! The Macawnivore stops growling and starts blowing on the torch along with Grug. It is just as frightened as Grug. Grug reaches out and pets the now gentle carnivorous beast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grug and the Macawnivore huddle together in a prehistoric armistice. When suddenly, Grug hears the dim tone of Eep's "shell signal." He rushes to the entrance to the cave. He surveys the raging CATACLYSM outside the cave as the world is being torn asunder. He hears the SHELL ALARM blow TWO MORE TIMES. His family is in trouble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're in trouble. Hang on! I'm coming. The scale of his problem sinks in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do I get across? Gotta think. What would Guy do? What would Guy do? Something occurs to Grug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What would I do? He absent-mindedly hands the torch to the Macawnivore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold this. Grug CLOSES HIS EYES, and CONCENTRATES. The ember of a thought FLICKERS TO LIFE in Grug's brain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I... have... an... IDEA!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Erm?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 2975 - GRUG CROSSES THE DIVIDE EXT. FIELD Grug uses a log to wipe tar all over a giant rib cage. Grug runs out of the cave and into a nearby field and startles a pack of nesting PIRANHA OWLS. He turns back to the Macawnivore. The meat-eating birds begin to chase Grug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Run! Grug leaps onto the Macawnivore's back as the birds move in closer. The ground begins to break up violently as lakes empty themselves and entire forests turn sideways. The Macawnivore rushes into a giant rib cage that Grug has coated with tar. The Piranha Owls hit the rib cage and stick to it. As they fight to free themselves, the rib cage lifts off the ground. Grug takes a giant tree branch, ignites it, and uses it as a rudder, scaring the Piranha Owls and prompting them to fly in one coherent direction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! As the cage flies, above the fiery landscape, Grug sees Douglas, sitting forlornly with the shell still in his mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Douglas? Grug doesn't even debate it, he runs back for the little monstrosity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, I know that guy. Grug JUMPS out of the cage and rushes over to grab the gerbils. Then Grug notices a familiar Liyote hiding under a nearby rock. He GRABS the Liyote. Grug sees the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stranded as well. Grug TWIRLS the Trip- Gerbils around his neck like a scarf.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get up!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: behind Grug - the pyroclastic flow is
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: closer. Grug CATCHES UP to the lumbering blimp-cage. He PUSHES it to go faster.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold on. The pyroclastic cloud BLASTS up the narrow passage. Finally, with Grug's strength, the cage CLEARS the edge of the cliff. The CLOUD HITS them all, SWALLOWING the Cage like a speck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Standing at the edge of the cliff alone, BLOWING her shell horn. Behind her, Sandy HOWLS. Gran puts a comforting arm around her grandchildren, even she has a tear in her eye. The ground begins to shake softly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not safe here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll tell her. Gran walks up to Eep. Eep continues to blow her shell horn. Eep and Gran share a moment. Eep breaks into tears. Gran looks at her shell horn and BLOWS it loudly. Eep is happily surprised. The whole family, even Guy, steps up next to Eep and begins BLOWING their shell horns. It's clear from Eep's expression she has no intention of budging.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I never got to tell him. Ugga appeals to Eep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eep, if your Dad were here, he would tell
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow, you sound just like him. Ugga looks up. Guy LOOKS UP. Everyone looks up!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daddy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He did it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's riding the Sun... but not very well. Everybody out of the way! Grug CRASHES near the family. They run to meet him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grug!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahhh! Where's the danger? Who blew their shell? But all Grug sees is his astonished family staring back at him. Eep RUNS to him, HUGS him ferociously, nearly knocking him down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love you too. The rest of the Croods begin running to Grug. Grug hugs each of them like never before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One, two, three, four, five, six... Grug puts his arm around Guy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... and seven. Belt wants to be acknowledged as well.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eerrghh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And a half. All the animals join in hugging Grug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And eight, and nine. Douglas runs up and licks Thunk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Douglas! Dad you saved him!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, a boys gotta have a pet. Suddenly the group rises up as the Macawnivore stands near them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Turns out, I'm a cat person. Grug notices a TAIL sticking out of Chunky's mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh! No. Chunky SPITS OUT the TRIP-GERBILS. He GRINS sheepishly. The TRIP-GERBILS run to Gran knocking her over in their excitement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You really need to see this. The whole family takes this amazing view in then looks to Grug for his decision.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We should go there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 3500 - EPILOGUE RUSHING TOWARD A SHORELINE covered in dense palms, gentle waves lapping at the sand. On Eep, fixing her hair. We PULL OUT to see the whole family preparing for a family photo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) This is me. My name's Eep. And this, is my family. The Croods. If you weren't clued in by the sun tans and pets, we're not exactly cavemen anymore. Grug has a wonderful picture making contraption they are about to experience. The slab of rock smacks them all in the face leaving the first family photo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's do that again. I think I blinked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ever closer to the beach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our world is still plenty harsh and hostile. But now we know the Croods will make it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: riding on the back of the Crocopup, delivering a drink to Gran, PULL OUT to reveal she is in a sled, hitched to a team of Liyotes. The liyotes are tending to her. Gran sips her drink.
direction.name: direction
